author: dims
msg: Because a xsl:if on the $primitive behaves differently in JDK1.5's embedded xsltc vs latest xalan
- change the check for QName ser/deser from XSl:if to xsl:choose/xsl:when to make it easier to add the check for OMElement in the same pattern.
